title: Amazon Linux 2023 - ALAS2023-2023-281: Important priority package update for ca-certificates
description:
Package updates are available for Amazon Linux 2023 that fix the following vulnerabilities:
CVE-2023-32803:
	An initial fix in Amazon Linux ca-certificates package relating to CVE-2022-23491 did not properly remove root certificates from TrustCor from the root store.
